section.text: *NOTE: This section was created by emergency legislation with identical permanent legislation that will become effective in January, 2022.*
section.heading: Reporting.

para.text: Every 6 months, starting from receipt of a grant, a grantee shall furnish to DOES a report on the following outcomes from the previous 6 months:
The total number of participants placed in employment;
The average starting wage for participants;
The average number of days from official enrollment in the Program to employment start date;
The total number of participants achieving each progressive employment milestone outlined in § 32-173.03(d)(3) and the average participant wage at each milestone;
The total sum of progressive employment retention bonuses issued to participants; and
The total sum of training outcomes bonuses issued to grantees.

Beginning no later than December 15, 2022, and by December 15 annually thereafter, DOES shall furnish a report to the Mayor and the Council of the District of Columbia containing the grantee performance outcomes reported pursuant to subsection (a) of this section.

section.codify:annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of § 32-173.05, see § 4146 of Fiscal Year 2022 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-159, Aug. 23, 2021, 68 DCR 008602).
For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 4146 of Fiscal Year 2022 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-159, Aug. 23, 2021, 68 DCR 008602).
